trans-unit.source: Allows you to customize the code generated from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document when using automated query tools.
trans-unit.target: 可以讓您在使用自動查詢工具時，自訂 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件所產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Schema importation occurs whenever a Web service proxy is produced through a tool such as the Add Web Reference dialog box found in Visual Studio, or by using the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88).
trans-unit.target: 每當透過 [加入 Web 參考] 對話方塊之類的工具所產生的 Web 服務 proxy，就會發生結構描述匯入作業在 Visual Studio 中，或使用方塊[Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)。

trans-unit.source: Schema importation also occurs when using the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) to generate code from a specific XSD document.
trans-unit.target: 使用時，也會發生結構描述匯入[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)從特定的 XSD 文件產生程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension> class allows you to modify the code generated when using any of these tools.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension>類別可讓您修改時使用任何這些工具產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, you may have an existing class that processes book orders on a system and you have an existing XSD document that supplies your orders.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可能有現有的類別，處理程序書籍訂單在系統上，而且您有現有的 XSD 文件提供訂單。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension> class, you can enable one of the tools to generate code that uses your class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension>類別，您可以啟用其中一種工具，來產生程式碼使用您的類別。

trans-unit.source: In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the <xref:System.CodeDom> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制產生的程式碼，您必須使用中找到的類別<xref:System.CodeDom>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)和[CodeDOM 快速參考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The steps to enabling the WSDL.exe tool (which in turn is used by other tools such as the Add Web Reference dialog box) to use your extension are:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用您的擴充功能啟用 WSDL.exe 工具 （這又供其他工具，例如 [加入 Web 參考] 對話方塊） 的步驟如下：

trans-unit.source: Create an implementation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立實作<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportSchemaType%2A> method to write code for the code generator.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportSchemaType%2A>方法撰寫程式碼產生器的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The method contains parameters that allow you to examine the intercepted XSD type and create CodeDOM objects that are used to generate the new CLR code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法包含參數，可讓您檢查攔截的 XSD 型別，並建立用來產生新的 CLR 程式碼的 CodeDOM 物件。

trans-unit.source: If required, use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportAnyElement%2A> method to handle \<xsd:any> elements found in the XSD document.
trans-unit.target: 若有必要，使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportAnyElement%2A>方法以處理\<xsd： 任何 > 項目 XSD 文件中找到。

trans-unit.source: If required, use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportDefaultValue%2A> method to examine default values found in the XSD document and return a different default value.
trans-unit.target: 若有必要，使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportDefaultValue%2A>XSD 文件中找到方法來檢查預設值，並傳回不同的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Compile your extension into a library.
trans-unit.target: 將文件庫中編譯您的擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: Sign the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 簽署組件。

trans-unit.source: Install the assembly in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC).
trans-unit.target: 將組件安裝在全域組件快取 (GAC) 中。

trans-unit.source: Modify the machine.config file to include the extension.
trans-unit.target: 修改 machine.config 檔，以包含副檔名。

trans-unit.source: See the [SchemaImporterExtension Technology Sample](~/docs/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextension-technology-sample.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[SchemaImporterExtension 技術範例](~/docs/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextension-technology-sample.md)。

trans-unit.source: Note that this example does not include a signed assembly.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，此範例不包含已簽署的組件。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension> with a command window.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會示範如何使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension>與命令視窗。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAny" /> that represents the <see langword="xsd:any" /> element found in the XML Schema Document (XSD).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAny" />，表示 XML 結構描述文件 (XSD) 中的 <see langword="xsd:any" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the XSD <see langword="complex" /> attribute has been set to "mixed".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />，指出 XSD <see langword="complex" /> 屬性是否已設為 "mixed"。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the attribute has been set to mixed, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性已設為 mixed 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas" /> that contains the collection of schemas found in the XSD.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas" />，包含 XSD 中的結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter" /> that is the importer being used.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter" />，正在使用的匯入工具。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> to which you can add CodeDOM structures to generate alternative code for the XSD.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" />，可以將 CodeDOM 結構加入其中，為 XSD 產生替代程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace" /> that represents the current namespace for the element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace" />，表示項目的目前命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions" /> for the setting options on the code compiler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions" />，用於程式碼編輯器上的設定選項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> that is the CodeDOM provider used to generate the new code.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />，用於產生新程式碼的 CodeDOM 提供者。

trans-unit.source: Handles the importation of the <xsd:any> elements in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 處理結構描述中 <xsd:any> 項目的匯入。

trans-unit.source: The name of the CLR type that the element maps to.
trans-unit.target: 項目對應至的 CLR 型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the <xref:System.CodeDom> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制產生的程式碼，您必須使用中找到的類別<xref:System.CodeDom>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)和[CodeDOM 快速參考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The value found in the original XSD.
trans-unit.target: 原始 XSD 中的值。

trans-unit.source: The XSD type name.
trans-unit.target: XSD 型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to specify the default value for the XSD type being imported.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您指定正在匯入之 XSD 型別的預設值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> setting the new default value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" />，設定新的預設值。

trans-unit.source: In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the <xref:System.CodeDom> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制產生的程式碼，您必須使用中找到的類別<xref:System.CodeDom>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)和[CodeDOM 快速參考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to manipulate the code generated by examining the imported schema and specifying the CLR type that it maps to.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您藉由檢視匯入的結構描述以及指定其所對應的 CLR 型別，管理產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The example below shows a simple implementation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportSchemaType%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeNamespace%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions%2CSystem.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範的簡單實作<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportSchemaType%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeNamespace%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions%2CSystem.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code checks the namespace and name.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會檢查命名空間和名稱。

trans-unit.source: When the right values are found, it adds the name of a custom assembly ("Order.dll") that must be referenced in the generated code.
trans-unit.target: 當找不到正確的值時，它會在產生的程式碼加入自訂組件名稱 ("Order.dll") 的參考。

trans-unit.source: It then adds a new namespace ("Microsoft.Samples") that is generated in the code.
trans-unit.target: 接著，它會加入新的命名空間 ("Microsoft.Samples 」) 所產生程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" /> that represents the XSD type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" />，表示 XSD 型別。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> that represents schema information, such as the line number of the XML element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" />，表示結構描述資訊，例如 XML 項目的行號。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas" /> that contains the collection of schemas in the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas" />，包含文件中的結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter" /> that is the importer being used.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter" />，正在使用的匯入工具。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> to which you can add CodeDOM structures to generate alternative code for the XSD.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" />，可以將 CodeDOM 結構加入其中，為 XSD 產生替代程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace" /> that represents the current namespace for the element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace" />，表示項目的目前命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions" /> for the setting options on the code compiler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions" />，用於程式碼編輯器上的設定選項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> that is used to generate the new code.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />，用於產生新的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to manipulate the code generated by examining the imported schema and specifying the CLR type that it maps to.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您藉由檢視匯入的結構描述以及指定其所對應的 CLR 型別，管理產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the CLR type that this maps to.
trans-unit.target: 它對應至的 CLR 型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The example below shows a simple implementation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportSchemaType%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeNamespace%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions%2CSystem.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範的簡單實作<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportSchemaType%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeNamespace%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions%2CSystem.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code checks the namespace and name.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會檢查命名空間和名稱。

trans-unit.source: When the right values are found, it adds the name of a custom assembly ("Order.dll") that must be referenced in the generated code.
trans-unit.target: 當找不到正確的值時，它會在產生的程式碼加入自訂組件名稱 ("Order.dll") 的參考。

trans-unit.source: It then adds a new namespace ("Microsoft.Samples") that is generated in the code.
trans-unit.target: 接著，它會加入新的命名空間 ("Microsoft.Samples 」) 所產生程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" /> that represents schema information, such as the line number of the XML element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject" />，表示結構描述資訊，例如 XML 項目的行號。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas" /> that contains the collection of schemas in the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas" />，包含文件中的結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter" /> that is the importer being used.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter" />，正在使用的匯入工具。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" /> to which you can add CodeDOM structures to generate alternative code for the XSD.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit" />，可以將 CodeDOM 結構加入其中，為 XSD 產生替代程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace" /> that represents the current namespace for the element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace" />，表示項目的目前命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions" /> for the setting options on the code compiler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions" />，用於程式碼編輯器上的設定選項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" /> that is used to generate the new code.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider" />，用於產生新的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to manipulate the code generated by examining the imported schema and specifying the CLR type that it maps to.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您藉由檢視匯入的結構描述以及指定其所對應的 CLR 型別，管理產生的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the CLR type that this maps to.
trans-unit.target: 它對應至的 CLR 型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: In order to control the generation of the code, you must use the classes found in the <xref:System.CodeDom> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制產生的程式碼，您必須使用中找到的類別<xref:System.CodeDom>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md) and [CodeDOM Quick Reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 CodeDOM](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/using-the-codedom.md)和[CodeDOM 快速參考](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c77b8bfd-0a32-4e36-b59a-4f687f32c524(v=vs.100).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The example below shows a simple implementation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportSchemaType%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeNamespace%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions%2CSystem.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範的簡單實作<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension.ImportSchemaType%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit%2CSystem.CodeDom.CodeNamespace%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions%2CSystem.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code checks the namespace and name.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會檢查命名空間和名稱。

trans-unit.source: When the right values are found, it adds the name of a custom assembly ("Order.dll") that must be referenced in the generated code.
trans-unit.target: 當找不到正確的值時，它會在產生的程式碼加入自訂組件名稱 ("Order.dll") 的參考。

trans-unit.source: It then adds a new namespace ("Microsoft.Samples") that is generated in the code.
trans-unit.target: 接著，它會加入新的命名空間 ("Microsoft.Samples 」) 所產生程式碼中。
